docstring.long_description:
Requires a CONNECTION_FSV block at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This block should also work with compatible R&S network analyzers.
docstring.short_description: Extract the sweep trace from an FSV network analyzer.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_FSV block).

returns.description: The sweep trace from the FSV is returned.

videos.title: Read FM Radio Signals using Flojoy
